word: H520 - אַמָּה - ʼammâh - am-maw' - Cubit - முழம்

sections.paragraph: cubit - a measure of distance (the forearm), roughly 18 inches (.5 meters)
Part(s) of speech: Noun Feminine / பெயர்ச்சொல் (பெண்பால்)

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: Prolonged from H517; properly a mother (that is, unit) of measure, or the forearm (below the elbow), that is, a cubit; also a door base (as a bond of the entrance): - cubit, + hundred [by exchange for H3967], measure, post.
Cognate: H517, H520, H522, H523, H538
